Leaderboard

    Game Rules

    • Use the arrow keys to move the snake.
    • Press the spacebar to pause/unpause the game.
    • As you eat tokens your score will increase by a multiplier that starts at 1x.
    • Every 10th token eaten the speed will increase gradually, you will also have a choice of various boosts.
      • Half Snake Size
      • Points Multiplier (compounds)
      • Keep Same Speed
    • Every 50th token you will have a choice of better boosts.
      • +1 Life
      • Reset Speed to 100
      • Go Thru Walls + Snake (30 seconds)
    • If you lose a life your score multiplier will reset back to 1x.
